thread.title: Extensis and vjoon Deliver Integrated Solution for Streamlining Font Delivery in Automated Publishing
thread.title_full: Extensis and vjoon Deliver Integrated Solution for Streamlining Font Delivery in Automated Publishing - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Extensis and vjoon Deliver Integrated Solution for Streamlining Font Delivery in Automated Publishing
text:
Extensis FontLink and vjoon K4 integration removes serious problems fonts can inflict upon publishing workflows
Portland, Ore. (USA) and Hamburg, Germany
Extensis® announced today it has released an integrated font management solution for vjoon K4®, the globally renowned cross-media publishing platform used by publishers across the world.
Available today, FontLink is a module for Extensis Universal Type Server ® that delivers fonts for documents in automated publishing workflows that use Adobe® InDesign Server®. FontLink 1.1 offers a direct integration for companies using vjoon K4, allowing customers to incorporate font management into their publishing workflows and eliminate the problems fonts can inflict upon the automated process.
“Having the correct fonts during production is critical for any InDesign Server workflow. Missing or incorrect fonts can quickly derail automated processes and pull resources away from critical tasks,” said Toby Martin, Vice President of Development & Strategy at Extensis. “The integration of FontLink with vjoon K4 represents significant advancements in quality, time and cost savings for automated publishers.”
“Extensis and vjoon share a mission to empower the creative process,” said Ralf Lemke, Product Manager at vjoon. “The integration of font management with our cross-media publishing system makes this solution one of a kind. We’re thrilled about the difference our collaboration with Extensis can make for publishing professionals.”
Companies interested in learning more about Extensis and vjoon’s integrated solution can contact Extensis by clicking here , and vjoon by clicking here .
About vjoon
vjoon®, a fixture on the publishing market since 1990, is a leading developer of software solutions for the management of digital content. vjoon rapidly integrates technology innovations into its solutions and consistently develops its products to meet market needs. vjoon’s flagship product vjoon K4® is one of the most innovative cross-media publishing platforms available in the market and lets you deliver your valuable content to any output channel – print, online, mobile, tablet. Based on the time- and cost-saving Unified Publishing Process vjoon K4 provides the tools that allow your team to publish anywhere, smoothly and efficiently – whether you produce magazines, newspapers, sales materials, annual reports or books. Renowned customers worldwide and in configurations from 3 to more than 1,500 concurrent users benefit from this sophisticated solution. In order to deliver premium system integration, training and support at the customer vjoon partners with a global network of more than 30 qualified partners. The headquarters of vjoon is located in the Hamburg Metropolitan Region.
About Extensis
Celebrating more than two decades in business, Extensis® is a leading developer of software and ser-vices for creative professionals and workgroups. Their solutions streamline workflows, securely man-age digital assets and fonts, and control corporate typographic branding. Used by hundreds of Fortune 5000 companies, Extensis’ award-winning server and desktop products include: Portfolio® for digital asset management, Universal Type Server® for server-based font management, and Suitcase Fusion® for single-user font management. Founded in 1993, Extensis is based in Portland, Oregon, and the United Kingdom. For additional information, visit http://www.extensis.com
